T04bsa037_u:0: Mahāyānapathasādhanasaṅgrahaḥ namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ sarvātītādyabuddhānāṃ janakatvāt pitarau tathā /
T04bsa037_u:4: sa ca triśaraṇaṃ gattvā nivārya sakalāśubhān /
T04bsa037_u:13: bhāvayet satataṃ bhaktyā buddhaḥ śīghraṃ tato bhavet // 7 //
T04bsa037_u:16: cittaṃ sudhālavaiḥ raktaṃ buddhayśuddhau ca duḥspṛśam /
T04bsa037_u:18: buddhabhūmimahaṃ cāptvā bhaveyaṃ lokanāyakaḥ // 10 a ba //
T04bsa037_u:20: bhāratasya tenaiva upādhyāya-paṇḍitena lokacakṣuṣā bhikṣuṇā kalyāṇamatinā
T04bsa037_u:21: (dge vahi blo gros) ca anūdya nirṇītam //
